---
title: FAddER exercise
subtitle: Shearing exercise for the Deep hip stabilizers
---

According to Brad Jones, putting the patient into a position of hip flexion, adduction, and external rotation while applying an axial load in the direction of the femoral shaft will create a posterior shearing movement on the deep hip stabilizers



- The [Ligamentum Teres]({{< var ref-ligamentum-teres.path >}}) is tensioned in hip *adduction + flexion + ER* @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
